name: Space Pet Rescue
description:
You have 60 seconds to save all pets, and yourself on spaceship!

This game is made for Fantasy Console Game Jam 3

Controls

One player mode:

   ARROWS / Z

Two players mode

    P1 : R,F,D,G / Z,N

    P2 : ARROWS / CTLR,ENTER

Restart 1 or Y (gamepad)

Menu 0 or B (gamepad)

You can select level in menu by pressing left or right arrow

Game is made using TIC-80 Fantasy Console 

Have Fun!

Post Jam updates:

Changed controls, now for save pet, you must drop it in capsule (not just collide with it).

Fixed bug when door is closing with pet inside on room switching.

Fixed bug when player drop pet, if another player is teleported

Added level 10

Added poops :)
